name: Spec-to-STL
description: Generative 3D prints collection. Spec-driven development: JSON specs define dimensions, colors, and constraints. FreeCAD Python scripts generate parametric geometry. Headless pipeline exports print-ready STLs and multi-color 3MFs.

projects.name: Krypton NAS
projects.description: 3D printable Raspberry Pi 5 NAS enclosure with DC Comics Krypton theme

projects.name: AirPods Max Headband Spacer
projects.description: Graduated wedge spacer to reduce AirPods Max clamping force

projects.name: AirPods Max Headphone Stand
projects.description: Organic sculptural headphone stand with tripod base, tapered columns, integrated spacer hook, and stretcher vice tool
